<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataTL extends data { const CODE = 'TL'; const PREFIX = 670; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '7\d{7}|(?:[2-47]\d|[89]0)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2[1-5]|3[1-9]|4[1-4])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '7[3-8]\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '80\d{5}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '90\d{5}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '70\d{5}'=>array( 'personal_number', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
